summary: The Bounty quests given by Skald the Elder are normaly not removed from the journal. This Scripts are fixing this issue by adding a line into the questscripts of the four radiant bounty variants. Optional also alters Goldreward depending on playerlevel.
descriptionHtml:
[b]Skald Bounty Fix[/b]

The Bounty quests given by Skald the Elder are normaly not removed from the journal. This Scripts are fixing this issue by adding a line into the questscripts of the four radiant bounty variants.
Does\'nt affect journal entries allready in the journal but fixes all bounty quests of skald after installing those scripts.

==============
OPTIONAL FILE:
==============
Skald Bounty and Reward Fix Scripts

Fixes the not removing journalentry and also alters the reward given by all bountyquests depending on the playerlevel:

Bandits: Up to level 10: 100 Gold
	 From there: Playerlevel x 10 Gold

Forsworn:Up to level 10: 150 Gold
	 From there: Playerlevel x 15 Gold

Giants : Up to level 10: 250 Gold
	 From there: Playerlevel x 25 Gold

Dragons: Up to level 10: 400 Gold
	 From there: Playerlevel x 40 Gold 

=============
INSTALLATION:
=============
Drop the \'Scripts\' folder into your /steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data folder. No esp, works for all languages.

===============
DEINSTALLATION:
===============
To get the adorable Skald-Bug back (or if Bethesda fixes this one day) simply remove the four Scripts from your /steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/Data/scripts folder:

QF_BQ01_00095125.pex
QF_BQ02_000BD77F.pex
QF_BQ03_000BD78C.pex
QF_BQ04_000CBA9A.pex
BQScript.pex if optionale scripts were used

Have Fun!
author: wallice

files.name: Skald Bounty and Reward Fix Scripts
